脈口.definition: location on wrist over the radial artery where pulse is taken in TCM

脈案.definition: (TCM) diagnosis, usu. written on the prescription; medical record

脈絡.definition: arteries and veins; network of blood vessels; vascular system (of a plant or animal); (fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric"); overall context

脈絡膜.definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)

脈診.definition: (TCM) diagnosis based on the patient's pulse; to make such a diagnosis

脈象.definition: condition or type of pulse (in Chinese medicine)

脈門.definition: inner side of the wrist, where the pulse is felt
